system	type	yaml.name	search	comment
System Family A	Type I	sys_A_I	T	This is the first type of system from a family of two types
System Family A	Type II	sys_A_II	T	This is the second type of system from a family of two types
System Family B	NA	sys_B	T	This system has an unknown mechanism
System Family C	NA	sys_C	T	This system has a well known mechanism
System Family D	NA	sys_D	T	This system should probably belong to the same family as C
